This assignment will use statewide open source data on Covid-19 hospitalizations. 

1. Go go the CA Open data portal: https://data.ca.gov/
2. At the top, click on "Datasets"
3. On the left, click on "CSV" 
4. Download the COVID-19 Hospital data (data dictionary and data set)

Be sure to read the codebook to make sure you understand what exactly the numbers mean, your answers must be in context of the data. 

1. Generate a random sample without replacement that is between 10% and 40% of the population sample size. The exact number is your choice. Set a seed to ensure reproducibility.

2. Choose a numeric variable Estimate the total, mean, and proportions of variables of your choice with 95% confidence intervals. 

3. Combine counties into districts or regions. Use Google to find existing district or region profiles and cite your reference. Not sure how to collapse factors? Check out [Lesson 06 from Math 130](https://norcalbiostat.github.io/MATH130/notes/06_factors.html).
